description: Build xác nhận kế toán Momo
body:
INSERT INTO dbo.CashCollectionReceiptsNoVAT
    (
         ReceiptCode
       , ReceiptDate
       , WarehouseCode
       , VendorCode
       , RefCode
       , CustomerCode
       , CustomerName
       , MobilePhoneNumber
       , Amount
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATType
       , CashCollectionReceiptsNoVATStatus
       , Remark
       , CreatedDateTime
       , CreatedEmployeeBy
       , IsConfirmed
       , ConfirmedDate
       , ConfirmedEmployeeBy
    )
SELECT 
	  'PT-MoMo-' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, C.TransactionDate, 112) + CONVERT(VARCHAR, C.Id)
	, C.TransactionDate
	, C.WarehouseCode
	, C.VendorCode
	, CONVERT(VARCHAR, C.Id)
	, C.MobilePhoneNumber
	, C.CustomerName
	, C.PayerPhone
	, C.Amount
	, 343
	, 298
	, N'Hệ thống tạo'
	, C.CreatedDateTime
	, C.CreatedBy
	, 1
	, C.TransactionDate
	, 'SYSTEM'
FROM 
	dbo.TransactionMoMo C (NOLOCK) 
WHERE 
	C.Id IN (
$CURSOR$
)
